ACK https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/pull/18500/commits/222253e37d9702181fe754d776177962d6794f30
Verified the parameters on my node with:
```
$ bitcoin-cli getblockstats 623950
$ bitcoin-cli getblock 0000000000000000000f2adce67e49b0b6bdeb9de8b7c3d7e93b21e7fc1e819d
$ bitcoin-cli getchaintxstats 4096 0000000000000000000f2adce67e49b0b6bdeb9de8b7c3d7e93b21e7fc1e819d
```
The same procedure also for the testnet.
Mainnet chainstate dir has 3.8GB size, blocks dir has 287GB.
Testnet chainstate dir has 16KB size, blocks dir has 26GB.
